name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instalamb - control what Instagram feeds you!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customise your Instagram experience to remove clutter and distractions. Hide unwanted stories, banners, threads and links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes AI suggestions, so you don't scroll the main feed forever.

Customise the navigation, for example getting rid of the Explore tab if the recommendations in it don't work for you, or removing clutter like the link to Threads. Change default page.

Eliminate metrics that try to hook you on increasing engagement for its own sake, such as like, following and comments counts.

All changes can be turned on and off in settings.
